com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder

Interface TagSupport


  • public interface TagSupport

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <S> S semanticTag(Class<S> type)
      Creates a semantic tag writer pipeline.

    • Method Detail

      • semanticTag

        static <S> S semanticTag(Class<S> type)
        Creates a semantic tag writer pipeline. The given type must be an interface that represents the start of a builder. Passing a type of a non-interface will throw an IllegalArgumentException. Calls on the interface methods are captured and stored. When TagBuilder.endSemanticTag() is called the returned TagBuilderConsumer is automatically generated by all captured calls and immediately replayed on the actual stream.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type of the builder
        Parameters:
        type - the interface type of the builder
        Returns:
        a proxy to the given interface type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the passed class does not represent an interface type
